title: add config to check actual data node in runtime or not
body:
in some  case there is lots of table need to add in run time
and cant save them to the config or somewhere before sharding sphere init

in v4.0.0 if you insert data to a new table not configured in table rule actual data node
sharding sphere wont execute because it will do the check in org.apache.shardingsphere.core.route.type.standard.StandardRoutingEngine#removeNonExistNodes, return -1 as the result
so i added a configuration to tell sharding sphere not check the actual data node, just execute the sql,and throw exception if it involved

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- table rule config add property _checkActualDataNode_
- table rule add perperty _checkActualDataNode_ , default value is true
- org.apache.shardingsphere.core.route.type.standard.StandardRoutingEngine#removeNonExistNodes : is not _checkActualDataNode_ then dont execute this remove

title: Fixed Unsupported data type:boolean exceptions
body:
When use jpa&mysql boolean in entity will convert to 0,1 by mysql store as tinyint.Then when read by resultset util the true value(0,1) and boolean type in entity will make ShardingException("Unsupported data type:%s", convertType);

Fixes #2528 .

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- support boolean in entity and tinyint in mysql.

title: 显著加速 sharding-jdbc 的启动时间!
body:
在本地测试的环境中, 经常需要重启项目进行 debug , 给员工带来了大量的等待时间, 随着表数量的增加, 在项目编写阶段debug 阶段, 反复的启动时间和 unit test 测试时间难以承受.

然后我看了一下源码, 发现这里有些地方可以改进. 这两个被修改的函数进行了大量的反射和组装map 的工作, 而这些工作都是比较单调机械的, 我认为, 没有什么本质上的线程安全问题. 所以这里用多线程进行了处理.

经本地测试, 原本启动时间在 两分钟左右的项目, 现在缩减为30秒左右.

Fixes #ISSUSE_ID.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
-
-
-

title: Optimize rewriting module
body:
Fixes #2275.

Some suggestions:

 - [x] Remove SQLRewriteEngine.originalSQL, use sqlStatement.getLogicSQL()
 - [x] For EncryptRule with SQLRewriteEngine, use current DatabaseType instead of DatabaseType.MySQL
 - [x] SQLRewriteEngine.isRewriteDistinctLiteral => isMeedRewriteDistinctLiteral
 - [x] SQLRewriteEngine.isContainsAggregationDistinctToken can move to sqlStatement, and let token type as an input parameter
 - [x] SelectStatement.getFirstSelectItemStartIndex() should as a Token and Split append distinct from rewriteInitialLiteral
 - [x] Make sure responsibility of rewriter and engine, only rewriter can use token
 - [x] EncryptSQLRewriter & ShardingSQLRewriter can new instance out of loop
 - [x] Make unify with stopPosition & stopIndex
 - [x] sqlBuilder is global field with SQLRewriteEngine, may avoid pass from private method by input parameter
 - [x] Make accurate with javadoc on SQLRewriter.rewrite
 - [x] Avoid start a new line if not exceed 200 char one line, at line 107 on EncryptSQLRewriter
 - [x] Make input parameter as same sequence for differnet methods, like: EncryptSQLRewriter.encryptInsertOptimizeResultUnit and EncryptSQLRewriter.encryptInsertOptimizeResult's param: unit add Predicate if Optional can not be absent, at line 105 on EncryptSQLRewriter
 - [x] InsertParameterUnit => InsertParameterGroup?
 - [x] Decouple SQLBuilder & ParameterBuilder
 - [x] Remove SchemaPlaceholder and test cases
